data.communities: in the IRC channel #perlfr on irc.perl.org
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hello,

    Following the release of Syntax::Highlight::HTML (used by
    Pod::POM::View::HTML::Filter to colourize the code examples in our
    articles[1]), we wanted to have something to colourize examples of
    shell code. As there was no module on the CPAN to do this, I wrote
    this one. Its API follows the one of Syntax::Highlight::HTML.

    [1] http://articles.mongueurs.net/ (in French)

    Thanks for reading
